talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

$Terrence Terramai$
Oh, you're back!

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
I'll go there on my own so go and tell the humans in the Royal Castle about the good news.
(Rubinart smiles. Go and let Terrence Terramai know about the news)

$Terrence Terramai$
Is it really true that you've found out where Feder is in such a short period of time?!
How did you manage...?!!

$Duke Stuart$
Of course it's a lie, it's simply impossible to find him so easily! Hundreds of soldiers are still recovering from their battle wounds.

${user_nick}$
...I met Jasmine, do you remember her? She's... the one from the future who burned Tel Rosa city down and built her expedition base. (Your words stir up a commotion in the castle. Stuart looks shocked too. Of course he knows who she is, he sent his own army to get her last time)

$Duke Stuart$
Of course I know who she is. Her technology really was something that we had never seen before. I heard you defeated her, but why is she in the picture again?

${user_nick}$
She didn't die and she ended up joining Feder.
Besides,... with future technology, she succeeded in making Feder the Red Dragon...
And the Red Dragon's Nest is being built in Ayrn Island right now.

$Duke Stuart$
Nonsense!! Someone who has the technology of the future became Feder's subordinate, and Feder's a dragon now...?!?! Don't try to spoil our mood with such absurd stories! How can we possibly believe you?!

$General Douglas$
Wait a minute, Ayrn Island? Isn't that the legendary Hero Island where the hero kings are said to be resting in eternal sleep? If the legends are true, there's a high chance Feder would go there, but how do you find an island which exists only in legends?

${user_nick}$
Please show me the map for a while... Ayrn Island is... right here. It's a small island. It's pretty far from here, and I'm the only one who can enter that place.(As soon as you finish saying this, you can hear murmurs asking whether it's another solo mission)

$Terrence Terramai$
…Silence!! Please fill us in. Why do you say that you're the only one who can enter?

${user_nick}$
…(Tell them about Red Dragon's spell and how you ended up getting the Red Dragon Rubinart's help after finding his book by chance)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(That would be great, but would it be possible...)</html>
<html>(I could, if I can find them quickly enough...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Terrence Terramai$
I see... Sigh... Even if our army could enter when the spell is lifted, what's worrying is what comes before that. Are you going to fight Feder all by yourself?! Do you think that's possible? Can't you at least gather some adventurers who are like you?

$Duke Stuart$
Anyway, this is too absurd. We can't be rash in sending our army.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
{user_nick} is already in that absurd danger! Besides, I've already received dozens of reports about weird flow of mana and an increase in the number of monsters around the place {user_nick} showed us on the map. This can't be a coincidence. That island could really be Ayrn!

$Duke Stuart$
How can anyone believe that a legendary island that no one managed to find is stuck in that insignificant corner of this world!
Kayleen, are you sure you didn't purposely leak your reports so that {user_nick} answered in that way?

$Duke Stuart$
(He is reading the documents like he's busy)

$General Douglas$
(He is discussing something with Kayleen)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
(She is listening to Douglas attentively)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Wh-wh-what did you just say...?!
There's a limit to how much insult I can take. You just crossed the line!!
(Kayleen's face turns red with fury)

$General Douglas$
Please calm down! Stuart, Kayleen! Both of you need to cool down.
We can't carry on with the meeting like this.
(Douglas desperately tries to improve the hostile atmosphere)

$General Douglas$
If the number of monsters has increased, it is our duty to get rid of them to protect our people. Whether that place really is Ayrn or not, we need to deploy our troops. We can investigate on the island as the soldiers counter the monsters. What do you think?

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
The sorceresses are in. Let that duke decide whatever he wants!
If he's going to be negative on everything, he can just suck on his thumb and wait for this world to end!!
So many people are trying their best to save the world, yet the duke knows nothing but being sarcastic!!

$Duke Stuart$
…Well I'm just trying to be more careful here since we are facing such a serious situation!
Don't you think you are trusting that adventurer too blindly?! That's just an ordinary adventurer!
Such ordinary adventurers can easily be found in every corner of Saint Haven!!

$Terrence Terramai$
And do you know how much this "ordinary adventurer" has done for us? Oh Stuart.
You shouldn't judge a person by their background, but by their contributions.
The Goddess taught us to be fair, yet you keep doing the opposite even when you're a member of the Order.

$Duke Stuart$
Whatever the case, count me out.
Do whatever you please.(Stuart shuts his mouth)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Hmph. The reports and the strange movements of the monsters are as real as they can be. Whether there is a nest there or not... there is a need for us to investigate. What {user_nick} told us has enough sense, so I'll get ready for an immediate dispatch by checking on the forcefield in the area.

$Terrence Terramai$
{user_nick}, you did well. If the Red Dragon Nest is not a place where you can go right away, why don't you take a rest for a while...?

${user_nick}$
…That's very kind of you but I need to prepare myself by investigating more about the nest. Only in that way I would have higher chances of winning.

${user_nick}$
(You hear murmurs again. People are whispering to each other that... You're still brave even after a fearsome battle... and that you're trying to protect the world even when your friend's achievements have been denied... that you have an amazing willpower and that you always lead in action, that you're the true hero of Calderock and Saint Haven... So many praises that you've never heard before are streaming out of everyone's mouths that you feel a little shy...)

${user_nick}$
(Not just me but... Geraint, Argenta, Iona, Rubinart, and... Meriendel... we only wanted to protect this world with whatever way we could... Everyone longs for peace in this world, and I don't want it to be destroyed all because of a screwed mindset of one person...)

$Terrence Terramai$
Now, silence! Very well, if that is your wish. Please don't overexert yourself. If you need help, tell us anytime. I'll send a letter to the Elf Elder so {user_nick}, you can concentrate on the investigation like what you said. (Terramai seems proud of you)

${user_nick}$
All right, thank you.
(Go and look for Rubinart at Anu Arendel)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:Talk}
Oh you're here! You look more resolute than before. Good.
Anyway... I managed to find my way to Anu Arendel but I thought of something that should be discussed privately between us... Hmm, how about discussing it in the Crossroad of Hesitant Past?

${user_nick}$
Erm... Okay... (That suddenly reminded you of your last encounter with Iona, but Rubinart grabs your shoulders and looks at you right in the eyes. He's so manly here... for nothing...)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9569_qu_01.ogg}
Hey don't look so frightened. Don't look at me like I just reminded you of a trauma. We're really going there just for a talk.
It's not a farewell or whatever, it's just that there are too many people around here who can hear us. Got that?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…Phew, you really don't have to worry about it.
(Rubinart smiles. Go to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past)

$Rose${sound:npc_Roze_9570_qu_01.ogg}
…I can't remain as a Prophet in this world anymore. I even affected your fate… and it was my own choice.
Whether you choose to follow the shadow is for you to decide.
Whether the power will be used to get rid of the shadow within you... cannot be decided by anyone at all.

$Rose${sound:npc_Roze_9570_qu_02.ogg}
I don't know whether to apologise to you or hate you… I don't know my feeling towards you.
I just hope you won't forgive the evil me nor the good me.
That's what the people you also cared for wanted. So I hope you will do the same...

$Rose${sound:npc_Roze_9570_qu_03.ogg}
…That's all I hope for…
Please take the path that is the same one as the others'… Please… I don't want any more tragedy… That's my only wish…
Please...(Rose fades away)

${user_nick}$
…Rose!! Wait!! I don't understand…!!

${user_nick}$
(Why did Rose say that to me? Was that the real Rose? Why did she mention the people we both cared for? Timothy died when he tried to save Rose... The only friend I can think of in this world is… maybe Comelina? But I didn't hear that Comelina was Rose's friend... Not even from Xian... Then why...? )

${user_nick}$
(When you are lost in thoughts, you hear footsteps)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Didn't you give up yet? You must be useless to Feder now.</html>
<html>Feder left you behind when you lost your powers. You were abandoned.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Rozalinde${sound:npc_Rozalinde_9570_qu_01.ogg}
Hey kid! What are you doing here? Did you… do any harm to my king?! Oh well, what can a weakling like you do to him.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why would he need someone like you to put the world back on track?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Rozalinde${sound:npc_Rozalinde_9570_qu_02.ogg}
What…?! Shut up. You don't know anything!! Feder is the one who will put the world back on track!!
I don't even want to see you around so keep quiet!

$Rozalinde${sound:npc_Rozalinde_9570_qu_03.ogg}
(Rozalinde shouts as she cries)What?! Don't try to act like you're something!!
I'm different from you, I am!! I can't live without him!!
I'm not just anyone, I'm someone important!! I'm not gonna hear you speak anymore!!
(Rozalinde quickly disappears)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Hey you're here. Did something happen to you on your way?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:No}
The Prophet? That's strange. Anyway, I'm not interested in such things. Let's talk about us.
What I wanted to talk to you about is the plan after your battle with Feder, supposing that you win him. Defeating him doesn't mean that the Monolith will close. The fact that The world is heading towards its doom doesn't change.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
No one in Lagendia has the ability to close the Monolith now. Looking for another Chaos Dragon would be like finding a needle in the desert. Even if you manage to find one, that doesn't guarantee it will be on our side or strong enough to close the door. No one knows.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
My plan is for you to go to Mistland.
Whether you meet the Goddess there or whatever, bring back something or someone who is strong enough to close the Monolith.
I know you can...

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
But... we can't send the young Ancient Dragon weakling or the Ancient Dragon who may implode anytime with two jewels, can we? For Velskud, I would advise him to just release the power, rather than trying to use the power himself... (Rubinart keeps staring at you weirdly...)

${user_nick}$
Does that even make sense?!! How do I go to Mistland?? How do I pass through the Monolith, and even if I succeed in doing that, how do I survive in a world full of poison?! I think you're having the wrong idea here that I'm as strong as you. I'm not! Besides, we don't know what's waiting for me at the other side!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>How do I know if you're really there?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:Talk}
All right, I'll explain one by one. If you've seen me in the past, you should know that I stayed behind in the Monolith with Meriendel with half my jewel left. After... Meriendel died... I must have went to Mistland. I wouldn't have died so easily, and things make sense only if I went to the other side. So go and find me there.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
I'm certain you're the only one who can do it. I'm in Mistland, I just know it. Meriendel wanted to protect this world... and Meriendel was precious to me. All right, next question! You asked how you would survive. Easy. My jewel still exists in this world too.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Yes. When you defeat Feder, make sure that you get the Red Dragon's jewel in your hands. Use that power to go to Mistland. Half of my jewel wouldn't be strong enough to do you any harm since you're being protected with Iona's power. My jewel will naturally try to join the other half in Mistland... so you'll be able to find your way easily. It'll keep you safe from Mistland's poison too.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Well, if you still feel uneasy, take Geraint with you. He may be a whining kid but he's still an Ancient Dragon. At least he can slap you awake when you lose your consciousness. You know how to control him. It was scary when he suddenly turned more mature after you had a good talk with him last time. (Rubinart shivers jokingly)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Isn't it amazing? All you have to do is defeat Feder and there's a way for you to go to Mistland safely.
This is a last chance and last hope at the same time.
There's no other hope for this world other than finding a way in Mistland. Unless you change your mind about saving this world...

${user_nick}$
You're just looking at the situation in your own perspective. But it's just impossible.
Even if I manage to enter Mistland, will that world let me find you so easily? Why would anyone in Mistland let me go unscathed when I'm from Lagendia...

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
What?! What did you just say?!!
(Rubinart's eyes widen even more and he pushes his face close to you!!)
You know that's not true! Wait… Don't you remember anything? I was waiting for you to tell me what happened and you even say that!!?

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Ah what should I do...
Can't you just realise it by yourself… Think about what I've done so far…
Gee, where do I begin and how much can I tell you? My original self didn't put any limits when he put his soul into the book... (Rubinart covers his face)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
(Rubinart takes a deep breath)
Oh well, I didn't hear any warnings from my original body so I guess I can tell you everything. So what I'm saying is...

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9570_qu_01.ogg}
(Rubinart painfully opens his mouth again)
You're [Beyond Dragon Rencraw] from Mistland...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>No way, I can't be a Beyond Dragon!!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Gee, what's with that reaction? You really don't remember anything? Well, of course, only your core is made up of something from Mistland. You're an artificial dragon created by adding Lagendia's materials on the tiny little fragment of Beyond Dragon. But still, you didn't know?!

$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:Talk}
What doesn't make sense is your attitude. You've been trying to save this world until now and I know it. I've been secretly happy about the change in you. I thought maybe it was possible for you to not recognise me after all those years... But it was actually because of amnesia?! From when did you lose your memory? Tell me everything you know.

${user_nick}$
(…Tell him everything about your life. Your encounter with Illusion, Lunaria, time jumps, the other self you saw in the Monolith… Though you knew you are not normal, you can't believe it that it was all because you're a Beyond Dragon...)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
…Phew...(Rubinart slaps his forehead) Can't you just realise it yourself when things are so clear? Why do you think Lunaria tried to find you? Lunaria is a fragment of Vestinel. She's like an incomplete Goddess. A fragment of her creation, Beyond Dragon, existed in this world. Of course she would come and look for it! She needs to recover the tools she lost.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Lunaria didn't call me a dragon, she called me a human!!</html>
<html>Lunaria said I'm a human from this era!!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Well, I've told you before. Actually dragons are more of tools of gods than normal creatures. Though Chaos Dragon has been corrupted and it has become neither this nor that… But isn't it the same for a tool to want to return to its owner and the owner to want to recover his or her tools?

$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:Smile}{sound:npc_Rubinart_9570_qu_02.ogg}
…Lunaria did that? In the end, fragments can only be fragments...? She couldn't see the reality but was only listening to her instincts. So she was just a tool too! No wonder you two got along so well, hahaha! Or maybe she didn't recognise you as a dragon because your core is too small and you can't even use the dragon's powers. Whatever it is, this is interesting... (Rubinart grins)

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9570_qu_03.ogg}
Good, {user_nick}. Let me break that firm belief you have in Lunaria by proving that you really are a Beyond Dragon. My safety device that was installed on you to prevent you from destroying this world has been activated.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Keke… Did you say someone that you think is you died when the Monolith opened? I made sure you the safety device would be activated to kill you when the poison of corruption flowed out from yourself or when you came into contact with poison and tried to be awakened as the Beyond Dragon. But seriously, you forgot about this too? This is something important.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Of course. You're dangerous. That's why you died as soon as you touched the poison from Mistland that must have slipped into this world when the Monolith's door opened. So that's why Lunaria tried to turn time back.

${user_nick}$
Then… Why am I still alive?! The door is still open…!!

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
You should thank Argenta for that. She ate up all the poison the moment the door opened… and you said you went to the past.
There was no time for the poison to get to you. That's how you didn't die and managed to grow up thinking that you're a human. Amazing.

${user_nick}$
Then… (the shock almost makes you numb…)
Then if you didn't put the safety device on me, Lunaria wouldn't have kept turning back time and that wouldn't have happened too…!

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Yeah, and the world must have been destroyed after that.
You said Lunaria kept turning back time when the Monolith opened.
Maybe that means my safety device played a part in saving this world until now. Hmm... But Feder and I closed the Monolith so... Maybe this is just a theory.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
You still don't believe me? Then one more thing. When Iona gave you his powers, he said you're a distorted one… Of course, he must have known you're not someone from this world. But he still trusted you. He's so foolishly naïve. Though I became like him now...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I can't believe it. Then all because of me...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Do you understand after hearing all the explanations?
Is it such a shock to you? The fact that you're a Beyond Dragon?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>The fact that I'm one of the people in this world stays the same...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart${action:Talk}{sound:npc_Rubinart_9570_qu_04.ogg}
Ah... Hmm... It must have been quite a shock. Maybe I should have just kept quiet about it.
But don't be mistaken. You were just born from a [Beyond's fragment] but you're not the [Beyond Dragon] himself.
It's just like how I was born from a [Chaos fragment] but I'm not entirely a [Chaos Dragon]...

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
But you still led your life pretty well until now. Of course travelling through time to find Lunaria and serving her from the time of the Ancients surely looks like the instincts of a Beyond Dragon though...

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Eh? You can't do it anymore? But if you ran away to a part of this world, I would have smelled you out but I couldn't. Besides, I made you during the Lunascent days but the Monolith opened during the Ancients' times.
The Monolith opened even before Lunascent existed and you were there when it opened.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What has that got to do with my face?!</html>
<html>How would I even think that I'm a Beyond Dragon?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
You really must have lost all your memory.
There should have been many weird things going on around you but it's amazing how you managed to live on without being suspicious.
I should have paid more attention to your brain than your face...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(It's just that I'm already too shocked to be shocked again)</html>
<html>(I'm on the verge of breakdown but I know I shouldn't...)</html>
<html>(It's painful for me, but if I think about Lunaria...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Red Dragon Rubinart$
(Rubinart bursts into laughter)
Oh well, I'm glad you didn't become gloomy like Iona. I can still have a conversation with you. I was actually worried I might have to tie you up on a pole again and give you a lecture about it. Maybe it's because you went through many things...

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Shall we go back to the topic now? Will you go to Mistland and bring back a power to save this world, Beyond Dragon?
Though I thanked you for helping Meriendel, I'm thinking maybe I can thank you for something else too. This is the first time I feel proud to have made you.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
But you choose your own way.
Like how I chose a life of coexistence with humans and didn't succumb to my instincts of destruction, I'm sure you can do the same too, Rencraw. (Rubinart gives you a warm smile)

${user_nick}$
(My choice… This world treated me with warmth… They treated me well even though I was a weirdo jumping across time… And Lunaria tried to save this world… Iona said it was to protect me… But Lunaria could have done something much more dangerous if she was thinking about me alone... Since she's a fragment of Vestinel...)

${user_nick}$
I don't want this world to end… Even if I may only be a fragment, I should take part of the blame for destroying this world. I thought if I'm the one who goes to Mistland, maybe it would be easier to find a way there. And... even if I lose myself... there would be other strong people there for me too. I will go to Mistland.

$Red Dragon Rubinart${sound:npc_Rubinart_9570_qu_05.ogg}
(Rubinart looks into your eyes)
All right… That's a relief. You've grown up to be a good boy. Lunaria couldn't have guessed you were a Beyond Dragon... Defeat Feder and find a new way to save this world, {user_nick}.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
(It’s time for the final battle against Feder.
The Red Dragon... Nest.)

※ You may enter the Red Dragon Nest through
Dark Oracle Pretzel at Arendel

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Now, the only thing left is the battle with Red Dragon.
Are you ready?

${user_nick}$
(Maybe it’s because you’ve started to relax……
but the moment you try to get Red Dragon’s half jewel,
the pain you’ve been enduring so far overcomes you and your sight becomes dark.)

$Geraint$
H, hey, open your eyes……!
Don’t tell me you are badly hurt!

(Geraint is about to cry)

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Don’t make a fuss, you little Ancient.
{user_nick} has just passed out for a moment.
Take him to the town, let him have a good sleep in a nice bed, and he will wake up without any problem.

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
Ancient, as well as Chaos, we are all in debt to you.
You saved the world today, {user_nick}.
And……

$Red Dragon Rubinart$
……Goodbye, Feder.

(Rubinart turns away with a bitter look)

※ Go to Saint Haven and find Temple Knight Elizer.

${user_nick}$
(Your hair is blowing in a pleasant breeze, tickling your cheeks.
As you open your eyes, you find Elizer on the guard.
This is…… Saint Haven.)

$Temple Knight Elizer$
You are awake, {user_nick}.

$Temple Knight Elizer$
Geraint and Velskud
were fighting over what the conditions of a nice bed are and then……
left you here so that you could feel the nice breeze.

$Temple Knight Elizer$
Though it is truly nice the breeze that blows around the summit.
……So, do you feel better now?
<html>$Complete Quest$</html>

$Temple Knight Elizer$
Haha, that’s good to hear.

(Elizer is smiling)

※ You have completed Extra Chapter 4. The Red King and the Red Dragon.

journal.title: The Penitent 1
journal.contents:
Let Terrence Terramai know about the Red Dragon Nest.

Saint Haven - Saint Haven Royal Castle (Terrence Terramai)
journal.todo_msg: Quest has been added. Go to Terramai and tell him about the Red Dragon Nest.

journal.title: The Penitent 2
journal.contents:
You're praised for conscientiously carrying out your missions... Which makes you a little shy.
It's a relief that a plan has been devised to counter the Red Dragon Nest.
Go and report to Rubinart.

Anu Arendel - Rubinart
journal.destination: Report to Rubinart in Anu Arendel
journal.todo_msg: The plan has been made. Tell Rubinart about it.

journal.title: The Penitent 3
journal.contents:
Rubinart seemed relieved after hearing that a plan has been devised and asked you to go to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past to talk privately.
Go to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Rubinart)
journal.destination: To the Crossroad of Hesitant Past
journal.todo_msg: Go to the Crossroad of Hesitant Past to talk to Rubinart.

journal.title: The Penitent 4
journal.contents:
Is that Rose at the Crossroad of Hesitant Past?!
Talk to Rose.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past(Rose)
journal.destination: Talk to Rose at the Crossroad of Hesitant Past
journal.todo_msg: Rose has appeared. Talk to her.

journal.title: The Penitent 5
journal.contents:
Rose is gone… Gather your thoughts.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Where Rose was)
journal.destination: Gather your thoughts at the place where Rose was standing
journal.todo_msg: Rose disappeared...?! Gather your thoughts at the place where Rose was standing.

journal.title: The Penitent 6
journal.contents:
This time, Rozalinde has appeared!
Talk to Rozalinde.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Rozalinde)
journal.destination: Talk to Rozalinde at the Crossroad of Hesitant Past
journal.todo_msg: Rozalinde has appeared. Talk to her.

journal.title: The Penitent 7
journal.contents:
It looks like Rozalinde hasn't met Feder yet…
Rozalinde is gone. Go and meet Rubinart.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Rubinart)
journal.destination: Talk to Rubinart at the Crossroad of Hesitant Past

journal.title: The Penitent 8
journal.contents:
Rubinart started telling you an unbelievable story.
A fragment of Beyond Dragon?! Listen to his story.

Anu Arendel (Forest of Little Shadows) - Crossroad of Hesitant Past (Rubinart)
journal.destination: Talk to Rubinart a little more
journal.todo_msg: Rubinart told you something unbelievable. Talk to him a little more.

journal.title: The Penitent 9
journal.contents:
The only thing left is to defeat Feder who has awakened int othe Red Dragon. Get help from Dark Oracle Pretzel and enter the nest.

Arendel Gate - Dark Oracle Pretzel
journal.destination: Talk to Rubinart a little more
journal.todo_msg: Listen to Rubinart's story a little more.

journal.title: The Penitent 9
journal.contents:
If you want to save the world from utter destruction, you cannot retreat or run away. The only thing left to do is fight against Feder, who has become the Red Dragon. Enter the nest through Dark Oracle Pretzel at Arendel and defeat the Red Dragon.

>※ If you fail to defeat the Red Dragon,, you may enter the nest again through Dark Oracle Pretzel at Arendel.
Red Dragon Nest - Red Dragon Nest Rubinart
journal.destination: Talk to Rubinart after defeating Red Dragon

journal.title: The Penitent 10
journal.contents:
The gentle breeze wakes you up from a dream. As you slowly open you eyes, you see Saint Haven before you.

Saint Haven - Temple Knight Elijah
